languages.text: "Как во главе протектората стоит {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, так навигаторским Домом заправляет великий {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатор{/g}. Именно новатор решает, с кем заключать союзы и какой путь уготован его династии. В нашем Доме..." {n}Губы девушки едва заметно кривятся.{/n} "...сейчас происходит передача власти преемнику, а стабильность Дома поддерживает Великий Регент Ааронто Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Как во главе торговой империи стоит {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, так Навигаторским домом заправляет великий {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатор{/g}. Именно новатор решает, с кем заключать союзы и какой путь уготован его династии. В нашем Доме..." {n}Губы девушки едва заметно кривятся.{/n} "...сейчас происходит передача власти преемнику, а стабильность Дома поддерживает Великий Регент Ааронто Орселлио".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Just as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} stands at the head of a protectorate, a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."
languages.original_text: "Как во главе протектората стоит {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, так навигаторским Домом заправляет великий {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатор{/g}. Именно новатор решает, с кем заключать союзы и какой путь уготован его династии. В нашем Доме..." {n}Губы девушки едва заметно кривятся.{/n} "...сейчас происходит передача власти преемнику, а стабильность Дома поддерживает Великий Регент Ааронто Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Just like the Rogue Trader stands at the head of a merchant empire, the Great Novator is heading a navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which way his Dynasty is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "...The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. The stability of the House is being maintained by regent Aaronto Orsellio."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Just like the Rogue Trader stands at the head of a merchant empire, the Great Novator is heading a navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which way his Dynasty is destined to tread. In the meantime, Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."

traits.locale_text: "Just as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} stands at the head of a protectorate, a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “王朝的统治者是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，而导航者宗族的统治者是{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}。家族该去哪里寻找盟友，该走上哪条道路，这些都由大族长来决定。至于我们的家族……”{n}卡西娅微微抿起嘴唇。{/n}“我们目前正在将权力移交给继任者，这个过程目前正在顺利进行。与此同时，大摄政王阿伦托·奥赛罗正在努力确保家族内部稳定。”
languages.original_text: "Just as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} stands at the head of a protectorate, a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."

traits.locale_text: “王朝的统治者是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，而导航者宗族的统治者是{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}。家族该去哪里寻找盟友，该走上哪条道路，这些都由大族长来决定。至于我们的家族……”{n}卡西娅微微抿起嘴唇。{/n}“我们目前正在将权力移交给继任者，这个过程目前正在顺利进行。与此同时，大摄政王阿伦托·奥塞罗正在努力确保家族内部稳定。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Just as a Rogue Trader stands at the head of a protectorate, a Novator heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."

languages.text: «Al igual que un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} dirige su protectorado, un {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} lidera una casa de Navegantes. Es el Novator de la casa quien decide dónde buscar alianzas y qué rutas seguirá su linaje. En cuanto a nuestra casa...». {n}La joven aprieta ligeramente los labios.{/n} «La transferencia de poder a una nueva sucesora está en curso. Mientras tanto, el gran regente Aaronto Orsellio mantiene la estabilidad de la casa».
languages.original_text: "Just as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} stands at the head of a protectorate, a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."

traits.locale_text: «Al igual que un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} dirige su protectorado, un {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} lidera una casa de Navegantes. Es el Novator de la casa quien decide dónde buscar alianzas y qué rutas seguirá su linaje. En cuanto a nuestra casa...». {n}La joven aprieta ligeramente los labios.{/n} «La transferencia de poder a una nueva sucesora está en curso. Mientras tanto, el gran regente Aaronto Orsellio mantiene la estabilidad de la casa».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}が保護領の長であるように、{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}は航宙士の一族の長なのです。どこに同盟を求め、どの血統がどの道を歩むべきかを決めるのはノベイターです。私たちの一族に関して言えば…」{n}若き女性は少し唇をとがらせる。{/n}「後継者への力の移譲は現在進行中です。その間、グレート・リージェント・アーロント・オーセリオが一族の安定を保っているのです」
languages.original_text: "Just as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} stands at the head of a protectorate, a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}が保護領の長であるように、{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}は航宙士の一族の長なのです。どこに同盟を求め、どの血統がどの道を歩むべきかを決めるのはノベイターです。私たちの一族に関して言えば…」{n}若き女性は少し唇をとがらせる。{/n}「後継者への力の移譲は現在進行中です。その間、グレート・リージェント・アーロント・オーセリオが一族の安定を保っているのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Genau, wie ein {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} an der Spitze eines Protektorats steht, steht ein {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} an der Spitze eines Navigatorenhauses. Der Novator entscheidet, wo nach Verbündeten gesucht wird und welchen Weg seine Blutlinie zu beschreiten bestimmt ist. In unserem Haus"{n}, die junge Frau schürzt leicht die Lippen,{/n}"ist die Übertragung der Macht auf einen Nachfolger gerade im Gange. Bis dahin gewährleistet der Großregent Aaronto Orsellio die Stabilität des Hauses."
languages.original_text: "Just as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} stands at the head of a protectorate, a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."

traits.locale_text: "Genau, wie ein {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} an der Spitze eines Protektorats steht, steht ein {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} an der Spitze eines Navigatorenhauses. Der Novator entscheidet, wo nach Verbündeten gesucht wird und welchen Weg seine Blutlinie zu beschreiten bestimmt ist. In unserem Haus"{n}, die junge Frau schürzt leicht die Lippen,{/n}"ist die Übertragung der Macht auf einen Nachfolger gerade im Gange. Bis dahin gewährleistet der Großregent Aaronto Orsellio die Stabilität des Hauses."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « De la même manière qu'un protectorat est dirigé par un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g}, une maison de navigateurs est gérée par un {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. C'est lui qui décide avec qui former des alliances et quelle voie sa lignée doit emprunter. Quant à notre maison... la passation de pouvoir est toujours en cours, {n}explique la jeune femme en faisant la moue.{/n} En attendant, c'est le vénérable régent Aaronto qui veille à la stabilité de la maison. »
languages.original_text: "Just as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} stands at the head of a protectorate, a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."

traits.locale_text: « De la même manière qu'un protectorat est dirigé par un {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g}, une maison de navigateurs est gérée par un {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. C'est lui qui décide avec qui former des alliances et quelle voie sa lignée doit emprunter. Quant à notre maison... la passation de pouvoir est toujours en cours, {n}explique la jeune femme en faisant la moue.{/n} En attendant, c'est le vénérable régent Aaronto qui veille à la stabilité de la maison. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Nasıl ki protektoraların başında {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirler{/g} var, Rotacı Hanelerinin başında da {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisleri{/g} yer alır. Nerelerde ittifak aranacağına ve soyun hangi yoldan gideceğine Rota Reisleri karar verir. Bizim Hanemize gelecek olursak..." {n}Genç kadın, hafifçe dudak büzüyor.{/n} "Yetkinin halefe devredilme süreci hâlâ sürüyor. Bu esnada Hane istikrarını Yüce Naip Aaronto Orsellio sağlıyor."
languages.original_text: "Just as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} stands at the head of a protectorate, a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} heads a Navigator House. It is the Novator who decides where to look for alliances and which path their bloodline is destined to tread. As for our House..." {n}The young woman purses her lips slightly.{/n} "The transfer of power to a successor is currently underway. In the meantime, Great Regent Aaronto Orsellio is ensuring the stability of the House."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl ki protektoraların başında {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirler{/g} oluyorsa, Rotacı Hanelerinin başında da {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisleri{/g} yer alır. Nerelerde ittifak aranacağına ve soyun hangi patikayı takip edeceğine Rota Reisleri karar verir. Bizim Hanemize gelecek olursak..." {n}Genç kadın hafifçe dudak büzüyor.{/n} "Yetkinin halefe devredilmesi hâlâ sürüyor. Bu esnada Hane istikrarını Yüce Naip Aaronto Orsellio sağlıyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
